text: Sanga, (allaha pharmavito) ki he majhya imana rakhanarya dasanno! Apalya palanakartyace bhaya balagata raha. Je ya jagata satkarma karita rahatata tyacyasathi uttama mobadala ahe ani allahaci dharati mothi visala (vistrta) ahe. Dhira sanyama rakhanaryannaca tyanca purepura aganita mobadala dila jato
